name: test
javadoc:
/**
 * Tests whether a code point is either a lowercase letter, an uppercase letter, or an Arabic numeral.
 *
 * @param codePoint the Unicode code point to test
 * @return true if the code point represents a lowercase letter, an uppercase letter, or an Arabic numeral; false otherwise
 */
improved_javadoc:
/**
 * Tests whether a specified Unicode code point represents a character that falls into one of three categories:
 * 1. A lowercase letter (e.g., 'a', 'b', etc.)
 * 2. An uppercase letter (e.g., 'A', 'B', etc.)
 * 3. An Arabic numeral (e.g., '0' through '9')
 *
 * @param codePoint the Unicode code point to test
 * @return true if the code point represents a character that falls into one of the above categories; false otherwise
 */
